sentences.en: A Farmer from Albany shall take their place, and down his back a Snake shall hang.
sentences.cn: 一位奥尔巴尼的农夫会代替它们, 他身后的蛇会悬挂.

sentences.en: Albany natives know him simply as'the birdman '.
sentences.cn: 奥尔巴尼当地人干脆叫他'护鸟人'.

sentences.en: Clues and leads were being followed up from Albany to Oakland.
sentences.cn: 从奥尔巴尼到奥克兰的一切线索和疑点都在追查之中.

sentences.en: Faulkner was born in New Albany , Mississippi on September 25, 1897.
sentences.cn: 1897年9月25日, 福克纳降生在密西西比州新 阿尔巴尼镇.

sentences.en: He wondered whether he were harbouring " love "'for this spontaneous young woman from Albany.
sentences.cn: 他怀疑自己是不是 “ 爱上了 ” 这位来自奥尔巴尼的纯洁的少女.

sentences.en: Lan, General Manager of Albany International Applied Technologies for the welcome speech!
sentences.cn: 下面,有请奥伯尼应用技术(苏州)有限公司总经理蓝志坚为大家致欢迎词.

sentences.en: One of my students from Albany, NY was suffering from bouts of severe depression.
sentences.cn: 我一个来自纽约奥尔巴尼的学生曾患有严重的抑郁症。

sentences.en: She works for the Agriculture Department in its Agricultural Research Service office in Albany, California.
sentences.cn: 她在农业部的农业研究室工作,该研究室位于加州的奥尔巴尼.

sentences.en: Such changes are unheard of in Albany.
sentences.cn: 诸如此类的改变在纽约州可谓前所未闻.

sentences.en: The circumstance of albany grease plant is simpler introduced in this paper.
sentences.cn: 简单地介绍了润滑脂黄油装置现状.

sentences.en: This is the ninth year the Albany Medical Center Prize has been awarded.
sentences.cn: 这是第九届奥尔巴尼医学中心奖.

sentences.en: Until then, everybody in Albany should swear off buck - passing and bite the budget bullet.
sentences.cn: 在此以前奥尔巴尼[市府与议会]的每个人都应扬弃互相推卸责任,而应咬紧牙关.

sentences.en: Years at sea, however, took Melville far from the familiar world of New York and Albany.
sentences.cn: 可是梅尔维尔多年在海上漂泊, 这就使他远离了纽约和奥尔巴尼那个熟悉的世界.

trans.tran_cn: 奥尔巴尼（美国纽约州的首府）
